State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: Cleans up HUD textures (such as the compass ticks or other arrows) that have went unnoticed. The cleaning consists of removing the old noise, and sometimes i replace the old noise with a new one.
State.Name: Vanilla Hud Cleaned

State.Author: lStewieAl - c6
State.Description:
Downgrades the game for FOSE support and more. 

Includes 4GB patch, mod limit fix and GFWL removal. 

GOG and Steam compatible.
State.Name: Fallout Anniversary Patcher

State.Author: Slippy
State.Description: A rebalance mod intended to keep the game interesting and challenging for experienced players.
State.Name: Vicious Wastes - Difficulty Rebalance

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Restores the ending of Fallout 3 that was changed in Broken Steel. The player no longer miraculously survives turning on the purifier, and has to sacrifice Sarah or bring a companion to continue.
State.Name: Fallout 3 Ending Restored

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: FO3Edit is the Fallout 3 version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: FO3Edit

Original.Name: Green Hud Colors for Terminal Screen Savers-23490-1-05-optional-1558031882.rar

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This mod adds custom animated screen savers to all desk terminals in the game.
State.Name: Animated Terminal Screen Savers

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Improves framerate in combat by fixing an engine bug that lowered framerate while attacking an enemy with a health-bar visible.
State.Name: Combat Lag Fix (FOSE)

State.Author: vurt
State.Description: New trees and flora. Several versions to choose from.
State.Name: FO3 Flora Overhaul

State.Author: Wall_SoGB - lStewieAl - VishVadeva50
State.Description: Increases resolution of water depth render target, thus significantly reducing aliasing.
State.Name: High Resolution Water Fog - Water Aliasing Fix

State.Author: RoyBatty and SciRika
State.Description: Optimizations and fixes for a large selection of meshes in the base game and DLC.
State.Name: New Vegas Mesh Improvement Mod - NVMIM

Original.Name: Ojo Bueno Less-Damaged Roads - for PERFORMANCE pack-39755-Quiznak.zip

State.Author: Ojo Bueno
State.Description: Welcome to the Ojo Bueno High Quality Texture Workshop -- Now available in single-file mod-manager-friendly texture pack downloads!
State.Name: OJO BUENO Texture Pack

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Uploader
State.Description: Fixed camera jumps, animation snapping, movement lock, broken aim in 3rd person.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack - General Bugfix

State.Author: hitman47101 and theswagnoob4
State.Description: A port/modification of the Anniversary Anim Pack by hitman47101 for FO3 because some of us don't want to download TTW.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack for FO3

Original.Name: F3 Reload Sounds for Anniversary Anim Pack-70818-1-1-1657881755.zip

State.Author: TheHoarder
State.Description: Restores weapon reload sounds for Fallout 3 weapons in Anniversary Animation Pack.
State.Name: Fallout 3 weapons reload sounds for Anniversary Animation Pack

State.Author: Ehamloptiran Sheson and FO3Edit Team
State.Description: An almost one-click LOD generator for Fallout 3
State.Name: FO3LODGen

State.Author: AtomicTEM
State.Description: Adds True Iron Sights animations and meshes to Fallout 3's Weapons using lStewieAl Tweaks Iron sight nodes.
State.Name: Iron Sights Plus

State.Author: lStewieAl - Yvileapsis
State.Description: Adds a real-time menu for looting. Engine plugin (no esp), based on Just Loot Menu by Yvileapsis.
State.Name: Loot Menu

State.Author: NS97
State.Description:
Re-texture and a mesh tweak for the vanilla Hunting Rifle and the unique variant, Ol' Painless.

Optional iron sight support.
State.Name: NS Hunting Rifle Replacer

State.Author: Ojo Bueno
State.Description: This is a complete compilation of ALL released Ojo Bueno Textures, REDUCED IN SIZE and OPTIMIZED for performance, playable with most computers, and all in ONE PACK!
State.Name: POCO BUENO Texture Pack

State.Author: Yaruosu
State.Description: Replace awfull vanilla DC Wasteland LOD for rocks and cliffs for a better transition.
State.Name: Wasted LOD - Cliffs

State.Author: Huerta
State.Description: Adds the option to fast travel with travelling merchants to their usual locations in exchange of caps. Random things may happen during these travels.
State.Name: Caravan Fast Travel with Random Encounters

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: ncrlover
State.Description: Interior/Exterior Ambient OverHaul
State.Name: eerie ambient

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername - Demorome
State.Description: A collection of INI mods to configure Game Settings to your liking. Powered by lStewieAl's Tweaks.
State.Name: Misc. Gamesetting Tweaks

State.Author: Kyndra72
State.Description: Changes the firing dialogue when you dismiss companions to make them less whiney and make you more polite.
State.Name: Nicer Companion Firing Dialogue

State.Author: KaneWright
State.Description: This mod makes door window and small window under door semitransparent.
State.Name: Semitransparent Door Glass(plugin version)

State.Author: Hairylegs222 RoyBatterian BenWah
State.Description: An update of the original unofficial patch with a unified single plugin and tons of additional community fixes.
State.Name: Updated Unofficial Fallout 3 Patch

State.Author: TheKetzku
State.Description:
Take your immersion to the next level.

More than 200 new ambient sound effects.

Over 3000 hand places sound emitters.

3D sound effect with actual distance and direction in the gameworld.
State.Name: ATMOS Ambient Sound Overhaul

State.Author: Arzoni
State.Description: Replaces the ingame Metro map with a much improved, more useful version. Now it actually serves its intended purpose: to help you get from point A to point B without going nuts!
State.Name: A Decent Metro Map

State.Author: darthbdaman
State.Description: Restores the ending of Fallout 3 that was changed in Broken Steel. The player no longer miraculously survives turning on the purifier, and has to sacrifice Sarah or bring a companion to continue.
State.Name: Fallout 3 Ending Restored

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Fixes a save bloating issue related to actors detecting the player, improving save/load speed and decreasing save size 10-30% depending on playthrough length.
State.Name: ActorCause Save Bloat Fix (FOSE)

State.Author: Queue
State.Description: Implements structured exception handling and sanity checking to reduce frequency of game crashes.
State.Name: NVAC - New Vegas Anti Crash

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
FOSE plugin adding a few additional functions and engine bugfixes ported from JIP LN NVSE. 

Includes FalloutCustom.ini support and ‘Search’ console command.
State.Name: Command Extender

State.Author: Gopher
State.Description:
HUD when you need it. HIDE when you don't.



Get the best of both worlds. The usefulness of having a HUD with the immersion of having none.
State.Name: Immersive HUD - iHUD

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
An espless collection of optional game tweaks with an INI to configure settings. 

Includes Faster Sleep Wait, Deselect Quests, Compass Height Indicator and more.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks

Original.Name: PipBoy 3000 HD Retexture - PC and Xbox-20373-3-52.7z

State.Author: Yingerman
State.Description:
This mod replaces the default Pip-Boy 3000 texture with a high-resolution version that retains the feel of the original. 



- 100% lore friendly

- Texture resolution doubled from vanilla

- Multi-language support

- Xbox controller support

- Improved readability of all text
State.Name: PipBoy 3000 HD Retexture

State.Author: Phoenix316
State.Description: A proper bug free version of Phoenix316's original Megaton Walkway mod.
State.Name: The Megaton Walkway

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This simple mod adds transparency and a flickering flame to the lanterns in the game to make them more immersive and realistic.
State.Name: Animated Immersive Lanterns

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Plugin to add clipboard paste support, as well as ctrl left/right and backspace/delete to aid typing in console.
State.Name: Console Paste Support

State.Author: cyberlazy
State.Description: Vastly improves the LOD noise texture used on all distant land. Uses only minimal video memory and greatly improves quality.
State.Name: Improved LOD Noise Texture

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Uploader
State.Description: Fixed camera jumps, animation snapping, movement lock, broken aim in 3rd person.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack - General Bugfix

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Removes ghouls "roar" animation that plays before they attack, meaning they now charge the player instantly - making them much deadlier
State.Name: Better Ghouls - No Roar Animation

State.Author: Me
State.Description: Applies some edits to four types of animals - radscorpions, bloatflies, vicious dogs, molerats, and partially to deathclaws.
State.Name: Animal Edits Or Something

State.Author: mamelukturbo MMMZ
State.Description: Adds recoil to weapons using MMMZs Weapon Recoil modders resource. Self-contained, compatible. Ignores relevant weapons such as flamers energy weapons BB guns etc.
State.Name: Can Has Recoil

State.Author: Hairylegs222
State.Description: Essential things I personally feel the game should have, and why weren't many things like that in the first place. Grey area fixes, non fixes, integrations, and implementations.
State.Name: Goodies

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This library will replace the in-game heap with a faster, more optimized version. It should decrease load times, remove some stutter and slightly improve frame rate.
State.Name: Fallout 3 Heap Replacer

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This mod animates the vending machines to work as vending machines and not as simple containers. Read description and watch video.
State.Name: Animated Nuka Cola Vending Machines

State.Author: KaneWright
State.Description: This mod makes door window and small window under door semitransparent.
State.Name: Semitransparent Door Glass(plugin version)

State.Author: ceski
State.Description: Modifies the Pip-Boy animation to be 2x or 3x faster than default. Works with most Pip-Boy mods.
State.Name: Faster Pip-Boy Animation

State.Author: Ludo
State.Description: Fallout 3 Fort Monuments Restored is a lore-friendly attempt to restore the custom signs intended for Fallout 3's pre-war military bases.
State.Name: Fallout 3 Fort Monuments Restored

State.Author: NS97
State.Description: Adds a scopeless variant of the vanilla .44 Magnum to leveled lists.
State.Name: NS Scopeless 44 Magnum Revolver

State.Author: Genin32
State.Description: This mod re-implements traits from New Vegas back into Fallout 3.
State.Name: Traits

State.Author: Voidwalker
State.Description: A collection of small mods that I made and use for Fallout 3.
State.Name: Voids Fallout 3 Misc Collection

State.Author: Ian Patterson - Stephen Abel - Paul Connelly
State.Description: The Fallout Script Extender, or FOSE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Fallout 3. It does so without modifying the Fallout3.exe or the G.E.C.K. files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.
State.Name: Fallout Script Extender (FOSE)

State.Author: LogicDragon
State.Description: This is a FOSE plugin that enables a visible body and player shadows when in first person. Also, any points where the game force switches to 3rd person (sitting/knockout/death, etc.) are now in 1st person.
State.Name: Fallout 3 - Enhanced Camera

State.Author: Mimezu
State.Description: Some growing collection of retexture works. for now, silver\'s house, fence, and small tweaks to the wasteland rocks.
State.Name: Mimezu texture project

State.Author: Bacon
State.Description: A simple recolor of the sidewalks found in urban areas to be slightly darker.
State.Name: Sidewalk Recolor

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This mod adds custom animated screen savers to all desk terminals in the game.
State.Name: Animated Terminal Screen Savers

State.Author: AltheaR
State.Description: This mod replaces the too long Vanilla cannibal animation with shorter one.
State.Name: Shorter Cannibal Animation

State.Author: doitsujin - Joshua Ashton - Sporif - Ph42oN
State.Description: Latest release of DXVK.
State.Name: DXVK

State.Author: SkyRanger-1
State.Description: FOSE required.  Improves stuttering and/or performance.
State.Name: Fallout Stutter Remover

State.Author: RuzkaTheBear
State.Description: Removes blurry dead tree LOD from base of world tree models.
State.Name: Tree LOD Bug Fix

State.Author: Huerta
State.Description: Adds the option to fast travel with travelling merchants to their usual locations in exchange of caps. Random things may happen during these travels.
State.Name: Caravan Fast Travel with Random Encounters

Original.Name: Dad Follows Player to Rivet City-23315-1-0-1542160853.zip

State.Description: During the Waters of Life quest instead of having to follow your dad or meet up with him he'll follow you.
State.Name: Dad Follows Player to Rivet City

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Allows skipping Vault 101 and starting the game in the tunnel just outside the vault door.
State.Name: Fallout 3 Quick Start

State.Description:
HUD when you need it. HIDE when you don't.



Get the best of both worlds. The usefulness of having a HUD with the immersion of having none.

State.Description:
An espless collection of optional game tweaks with an INI to configure settings.

State.Author: doitsujin - Joshua Ashton - Sporif - Ph42oN
State.Description: Latest release of DXVK.

State.Author: jet4571
State.Description: Green glowing radioactive muck pools
State.Name: Glowing muck pools

State.Author: Kyndra72
State.Description: Adds an additional dialogue option when speaking to the randomly encountered Wastelander ghouls that enables the player to kindly say goodbye, rather than a single rude option that the player is normally forced to use to exit the conversation.

Original.Name: Church of the atom Mutant edition-5293.rar

State.Description:
English Translation for Animated Terminal Screen Savers.

Compatible with FWE.
State.Name: Animated Terminal Screen Savers (English Translation)

State.Description: Truly updated OneTweak.

State.Description: Removes unnatural color tints from all exterior and interior spaces including DLC's

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This mod adds custom animated screen savers to all desk terminals in the game.

State.Description: Just a fix for Genis38's Traits mod for Fallout 3. Four Eyes before didn't work but with this fix it will. REQUIRES the original mod obviously.

Original.Name: Nicer Red and Shorty's Death Dialogue-25607-1-0-1681241365.zip

State.Description: Changes the dialogue you can use to tell Red and Shorty's friends if they're dead to a much nicer version.
State.Name: Nicer Red and Shorty Death Dialogue

State.Author: Oxenolly
State.Description: Rainbow Goblins have attacked all of the Mojave's brahmin, making their skin just a bit darker.
State.Name: The Desaturated Brahmin

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Fugacity is a lightweight, vanilla-plus difficulty and balance mod that provides a comprehensive set of balance tweaks to make the game subtly harder, but preserves the spirit of the vanilla game.
State.Name: Fugacity - Vanilla-Plus Balance and Difficulty Overhaul

State.Author: c6
State.Description: Improves game performance in combat by disabling lights produced by muzzle flashes.
State.Name: No Muzzle Flash Lights

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: Patch for Clean Vanilla HUD to fit the Fallout 3 aesthetics
State.Name: Clean Vanilla Hud - FO3 Aesthetics Patch

State.Author: lStewieAl - Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Increases the render resolution of in-game screens (Pipboy, terminals, character creation menu) to match game's screen resolution.
